page.title: 06CHAPELS IN CLUNBURY AREA
page.content: There are three chapels but none of them are now used for service. The ones in{Clunbury}and{Twitchen}have been converted into houses and the one in{Aston_on_Clun}is used for storage. All these chapels are tiny, very much smaller than{Clunbury}Church. When we looked at the{Twitchen chapel there was a{Case Skid Steer {Uni_Loader}model{1529}and a{Smalley 5 {Excavator}being used to landscape the chapel area. There were old hymn sheets blowing around. This chapel was last used about a year ago.
